name: The Personal Finance Game
description:
Try to make $10,000,000.00 before you croak! Or keep playing to see how big of a fortune you can build.

Watch out! If you live too frugally, it won't be good for your mental or physical health.

Each game can range from a few minutes to twenty minutes.

Three difficulties:

Easy: Start as a trust fund baby with one million dollars

Medium: Start with a small inheritance of $50,000.00

Hard: Start with nothing and make it on your own!
